name: Wedigbio-dashboard
body: #WeDigBio Dashboard Features: * Maps of cumulative participant activity across project and events [Torque Map](https://www.wedigbio.org/content/transcription-activity-map) * Heat-map of collection localities transcribed * Stream of thumbnail images that have been transcribed * Timeline of transcribed records by collection date * Leaderboard _RSS feeds should look something like this:_ ```xml Project name, if more than one project on this feed Specimen name or Collector Name/Collection Name Specimen page URI (on transcribing site) Thumbnail URI Lat. of collecting event Long. of collecting event Transcription Lat Transcription Long Time or period of collecting Timestamp of transcription User or project who create this transcription ``` ##Current Dashboard Data Providers [Herbaria@Home](http://beta.herbariaunited.org/recentthumbnail.rss.php) ```xml Blysmus compressus http://herbariaunited.org/specimen/395585/ ]]> hollyrebecca @herbariumathome 2015-06-22T11:58:24+00:00 ``` [LesHebonautes] (http://lesherbonautes.mnhn.fr/contributions/last/rss) ```xml Triticum cristatum P03218978 geolocated by jonnard Histoires de bl√©s
